body: In order to accommodate all places where our spack install is used, we compile all packages for an older target (`sandybridge`). Systems which have a newer micro architecture (e.g., `ivybridge`) fail to load the module command because #10975 tries to load the installed `environment-modules` package for the current target architecture only, not falling back to compatible older ones.
title: `spack load` broken for multi-architecture deployments by #10975
